posts.title: New Project in Work...
posts.content:
We are happy to announce that we're working on a WinRT Universal version of Project Cele - currently under name of 'Project Timeout'. It will go active developent right when we will finish development for Update 2 of Cele. For now planned features are: .m4a/.flac/.aac support at start, videos for Now Playing Screen, Now Playing Screen in full mode and more.

Stay tuned!

posts.title: Welcome to the Red Era
posts.content:
We decided to change the paint job. Blue is so 2007. Red is the future. This update also introduces a new JSON-based engine for our blog, meaning updates will come much faster.

Check out the sidebar for the status of our apps.

posts.title: Project Cele: Patch 2 Update
posts.content:
Added many small features that you'll like! Changelog:

  • Added 'Smol Cele' mode
  • Added Keyboard Shortcuts
  • Added Search in All Tracks tab
  • Fixed album tracklist not clearing when switching tabs
  • Fixed info panels covering track lists
  • Replaced emoji symbols with proper Unicode text ONE LAST TIME

Download via the link in the sidebar!

posts.title: Farewell to Project Spot!
posts.content: It is with a heavy heart that we announce the closure of Project Spot!. The servers are officially offline. Thank you for the memories.

posts.title: Migrating to Spot!
posts.content:
Now all of the news from vertigo will be available on Spot! @ vertigo!

We are waiting for You!

posts.title: Hi Spot!
posts.content:
Big congratulations on Project Spot finally releasing! You can follow us on Spot! @ vertigo. We have SO MUCH to share with y'all like a Desktop App (which is currently already in work...), Several Communities at One Time, Video Support and many more!

Thanks for believing in us!
